data.eml:eml: A new species of Macrosaccus (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae: Lithocolletinae) from Arizona, USA

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eiseman, Charles S., Davis, Donald R. (2017): A new species of Macrosaccus (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae: Lithocolletinae) from Arizona, USA. Zootaxa 4358 (2): 385-392, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4358.2.11
